alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:11PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Otero, southwestern Prowers, western Baca, eastern Las Animas and southern Bent Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 311 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles north of Kim, or 34 miles west of Springfield, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Pritchett, Kim, Higbee and Two Buttes Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
